question:
Consider the following statements about the Jan Aushadhi Scheme:
  1. It is an initiative under the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare (MOHFW)
  2. Under the scheme, the Bureau of Pharma PSUs of India (BPPI) provides monetary assistance for setting up Jan Aushadhi Outlet
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect because Jan Aushadhi Scheme is an initiative under the Ministry of Chemicals and Fertilizers. Bureau of Pharma PSUs of India (BPPI) provides one-time assistance of Rs.2.50 lakhs as furnishing and establishment costs for setting up a Jan Aushadhi Outlet. Under the Jan Aushadhi Scheme, the State Governments are required to provide space in Government Hospital premises or any other suitable locations for the running of the Jan Aushadhi Stores (JAS). Any NGO/Charitable Society/Institution/Self Help Group with experience of minimum 3 years of successful operation in welfare activities can also open the Jan Aushadhi store outside the hospital premises.
